sentence.Network_en: Receipt of semiannual interest on $ 5 at 8 %.
sentence.Network_cn: 收到面值5美元,年息8%的债券的半年利息.

sentence.Network_en: Both make semiannual invest payments called coupon payments.
sentence.Network_cn: 每半年一次的投资支付称为息票.

sentence.Network_en: Two months later, on March 1, a semiannual interest payment is made to bondholders.
sentence.Network_cn: 在两个月之后的3月1日, 给债券持有者支付半年的利息.

economists expect the Bank of Japan in its semiannual outlook Friday to forecast the core consumer price index will fall the fiscal year ending in March 2012 , at a rate of at least 0.5 % .经济学家期待日本央行在周五其半年度前景报告预测核心消费者物价指数将以至少0.5%的比率在财政年度下降到2012年3月。

list.abs: ... . . .与之相对的是APR即annual percentage rates。APY在计算时，可以按月（monthly compounding)，按季复利（quarterly compounding)，半年复利（semiannual compounding)等。例如，假设你以APR 5%存了10000元，并且利息只有一年，那么一年后你将得到500元利息。.

entry.def: A semi-annual event happens twice a year.

example.ex: ...the semi-annual meeting of the International Monetary Fund.
example.tran: 半年一次的国际货币基金组织会议

means.word_mean: 1. occurring or payable twice each year
